variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: Peripheral blood samples were collected from healthy and sickle cell anemia patients.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Complete loss-of-function (hemoglobin S), associated with sickle cell anemia.
Readout description.Result Description: Presence of the hemoglobin S band, indicating the presence of the variant NM_000645.5:c.340G>A.

Biological replicates.Description: Samples were collected from multiple patients with sickle cell anemia and healthy controls.

Basic positive control.Description: Samples from healthy individuals, demonstrating the absence of the hemoglobin S band.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Absence of the hemoglobin S band.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of the hemoglobin S band.
